clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Pleural effusion on the left lower lobe side, moderate in size.
Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in left lower lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
